scenario_text.value:
Well, it’s not over this way. There’s nothing
here.

Got it. I feel like it has to be somewhere
nearby, though.

There’s some fog here too, if only a little.
Better find it before the Kenzoku show up...

(Minoru’s a little panicked. Makes sense. We
could get attacked by the Kenzoku anytime.)

(Oh yeah, I brought a drink with me. Should
I give him some to cheer him up?)

(Maybe I could make it a little interesting?
Tease him a bit, or⁠—no, now’s not the time.)
(What should I do?)
Hand over the drink.
Tease Minoru.
Do nothing.

Hey man, you thirsty? Here, have some of my
drink.
Oh word? Thanks a lot!
Ahh! That hit the spot...

Thanks a mil, friendo. My throat was bone
dry. I must’ve been real nervous.
Sure, glad to see you’ve calmed down a bit.
Right, let’s get back to the search!
Hey, Minoru, I’ve got some water here...
Oh! You giving me a sip?
*Gulp* *gulp* *gulp*...

AHHH! What’s the deal, drinking it all by
yourself?!

Well... I never said I was gonna give you
some, did I?
Oh, you CAN’T be serious, Takuma.

This is no time for goofing off, you two!
Take the search seriously.
Yeah, sorry man...
...Now look, you got us in trouble.
My bad, my bad. Here, there’s some left...

(Well, we’re supposed to be on alert.
I shouldn’t break his concentration.)

(Falcomon’ll protect us if something happens.
I’ll just keep an eye on Minoru.)
Man, I can’t find a damn thing.
If only we had some sort of clue.

Our time is better spent searching than
complaining. Let’s check over there next.
Right.
We’ll keep looking around in this area.

Still haven’t found anything, Takuma, but
I’ll keep looking around here.
You should probably try somewhere else.

Sorry, I’m still coming up empty. You look
somewhere else, Takuma.
